data.title: The Master's Touch Inc.
data.meta_description:
The Master's Touch Inc. | 611 followers on LinkedIn. The Masterâ€™s Touch is the leader in providing a business system in tile and grout cleaning. We invented and patented the very first hard surface restoration system utilizing an extractor mechanism in the year 2000.

Over the past nine years, through continued pioneering and technology advancements, we have developed the most user-friendly system in the world!
